infos.value: Come to think of it...you mentioned that King Khury doesn't trust Glaciela, right?
Are they not father and daughter? I don't see whyâ€¦
Lord Mont... You know the truth of Lady Glaciela's birth mother, correct?
She is not a child born of the queen...
Before Lady Glaciela was born, King Khury's queen bore him a prince.
Alas, there was a power struggle regarding the claim to the throne, culminating in the prince's assassination.
So it then was decided that Lady Glaciela, who was born in the aftermath of the struggle, would inherit the throne.
However, like the murdered prince before her, Lady Glaciela became the target of an assassination plot.
Against all odds, Lady Glaciela struck back against numerous hardships and won, securing her position as successor to the throne.
That is where this tale should have ended.
King Khury had terms for Lady Glaciela if she were to be crowned queen.
